```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(rpart.plot)
library(randomForest) 
library(infer) 

library(caret)
library(ROCR) 
library(pROC) 
library(stepPlr) 
library(doMC) 
library(xtable) 

rm(list=ls())

# define seed
proj.seed <- 202202

# read in data
pdata <- read.csv("plasso.csv") %>% 
  select(-X) %>% 
  na.omit()
```

```{r}
set.seed(proj.seed)

# logistic model (for comparison)
logistic_mod <- logistic_reg() %>%
  set_engine("glm") 

logistic_fit <- fit(logistic_mod,
                    factor(ptype) ~ year + timep + electricity + birthrate + deathrate + fertility + lifeexpf,
                    data = pdata)
lfitdf <- logistic_fit %>%
  tidy(conf.int = TRUE) %>%
  select(term, estimate, conf.low, conf.high)

# tree model
tree_mod <- decision_tree() %>%
  set_engine("rpart",
             model = TRUE) %>%
  set_mode("classification")

house_region_tree <- fit(tree_mod,
                         factor(ptype) ~ year + timep + electricity + birthrate + deathrate + fertility + lifeexpf,
                    data = pdata)

hrtfitdf <- house_region_tree$fit %>%
  prp(extra = 6, varlen = 0, faclen = 0)

# forest model
forest_mod <- rand_forest() %>%
  set_engine("randomForest") %>%
  set_mode("classification")

house_forest <- fit(forest_mod,
                    factor(ptype) ~ year + timep + electricity + birthrate + deathrate + fertility + lifeexpf,
                    data = pdata)

tibble(error = house_forest$fit$err.rate[, "OOB"],
       trees = 1:500) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = trees, y = error)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_classic()
```
